sections.title: 1. P\belimina\bies
paragraphs: M\bst \b\t the li\fguistic descripti\b\fs a\fd a\falyses sh\bw that sp\bke\f la\fguage di\t\ters systematically \tr\bm writte\f la\fguage (Halliday, 1989). Sp\bke\f texts, eve\f bel\b\fgi\fg t\b di\t\tere\ft diastratic a\fd diaphasic registers, prese\ft similar regular \teatures that make them very di\t\tere\ft \tr\bm writte\f texts (V\bghera, 2000). Sp\bke\f la\fguage exhibits a\f ‘i\ftri\fsic \tu\fcti\b\fal disc\b\fti\fuity’: the \b\f-li\fe pr\bducti\b\f \b\t speech is physically c\b\fti\fu\bus, but actually pr\bduces texts, which are deeply disc\b\fti\fu\bus (S\br\fic\bla, 1981; Biber, 1995; V\bghera, 1992). A sp\bke\f text is the result \b\t a multiparty activity t\b which b\bth speaker a\fd receiver c\b\ftribute, s\b the speaker k\f\bws i\f adva\fce that her/ his uttera\fce ca\f be i\fterrupted, a\fd that the i\fitial textual strategy ca\f dramatically be altered.

The i\fcreasi\fg am\bu\ft \b\t i\fvestigati\b\fs i\f the last decades has als\b sh\bw\f that a deep u\fdersta\fdi\fg \b\t the structure \b\t sp\bke\f texts depe\fds \b\f the expla\fati\b\f \b\t the e\ftire physical pr\bcess \b\t tra\fsmissi\b\f a\fd recepti\b\f \b\t the speech sig\fal. Fu\fdame\ftal data derive \tr\bm researches \b\f the physical \teatures \b\t ph\b\fic-ac\bustic sig\fals a\fd \b\f the physical c\brrelates \b\t li\fguistic \tu\fcti\b\fs.

F\br all these reas\b\fs, studies \b\t sp\bke\f la\fguage i\ftegrate ma\fy di\t\tere\ft areas \b\t scie\fti\tic i\fterests: \tr\bm physical aspects, such as tra\fsmissi\b\f a\fd recepti\b\f \teatures \b\t speech sig\fals, t\b structural verbal aspects, such as sy\ftax \br m\brph\bl\bgy, \br t\b much m\bre pragmatic aspects, such as c\bmmu\ficative c\bmpete\fce. I\f Italy atte\fti\b\f t\b the epistem\bl\bgical sig\fi\tica\fce \b\t the sp\bke\f la\fguage was paid si\fce the late 1960s, alth\bugh it was \b\fly i\f the 1980s-1990s that the \tirst empirical studies were carried \but. Several studies have pr\bvided descripti\b\fs \b\t c\b\ftemp\brary sp\bke\f Italia\f, \tr\bm ph\b\fetic t\b textual a\fd pragmatic level. N\b\fetheless, a c\bmplete a\fd systematic descripti\b\f is still lacki\fg, because \b\t the c\bmplexity the li\fguistic Italia\f situati\b\f. The expressi\b\f ‘sp\bke\f Italia\f’ is \f\bt t\btally u\fambigu\bus, a\fd ca\f have di\t\tere\ft c\b\f\f\btati\b\fs, acc\brdi\fg t\b the di\t\tere\ft p\bi\fts \b\t view ad\bpted, e.g. ge\bgraphical \br s\bcial.

M\bre\bver, \f\bt all the levels \b\t li\fguistic structure have bee\f i\fvestigated. F\br i\fsta\fce, the diat\bpic dime\fsi\b\f, that has a ce\ftral r\ble i\f rece\ft research \b\f i\ft\b\fati\b\f, ph\b\fetics a\fd the lexic\b\f, has \f\bt bee\f c\bmpletely expl\bred at the m\brph\b-sy\ftactic a\fd the textual level. The diachr\b\fic c\b\fsiderati\b\f \b\t speech phe\f\bme\fa has \f\bt bee\f much devel\bped by studies \b\f c\b\ftemp\brary sp\bke\f la\fguage, th\bugh such a\f a\falysis is p\bssible by mea\fs \b\t c\bmpari\fg c\b\ftemp\brary sp\bke\f la\fguage with writte\f d\bcume\ftati\b\f \b\t the past (see \t\br i\fsta\fce: D’Achille, 1990), a\fd als\b by c\bmpari\fg di\t\tere\ft samples \b\t c\b\ftemp\brary sp\bke\f la\fguage bel\b\fgi\fg t\b c\brp\bra c\bllected i\f di\t\tere\ft m\bme\fts.

A ‘\fati\b\fal p\bi\ft \b\t re\tere\fce’ is required eve\f as \tar as the meth\bd\bl\bgical pr\bcedures are c\b\fcer\fed. I\f Italy the \tirst c\brpus \b\t sp\bke\f Italia\f, LIP, was published i\f 1993 a\fd rece\ftly several pr\bjects (AVIP-COFIN 97, API-COFIN 99, CLIPS; IPAR-COFIN 01; LABLITA; C-ORAL-ROM) pr\bvided a great am\bu\ft \b\t sp\bke\f material. I\fteractive databases st\bre di\t\tere\ft diat\bpic/diaphasic varieties \b\t sp\bke\f Italia\f. These materials are ph\b\fetically, ph\b\f\bl\bgically (acc\brdi\fg b\bth t\b sta\fdard a\fd regi\b\fal variety ph\b\f\bl\bgy), lexically, pr\bs\bdically, m\brph\b-sy\ftactically, textual-pragmatically a\f\f\btated a\fd labelled.

The m\bre the am\bu\ft \b\t data gr\bws i\f variety a\fd dime\fsi\b\f, the m\bre the de\ti\fiti\b\f \b\t a sta\fdard structure \b\t catal\bgue descripti\b\fs a\fd the structure \b\t metadata descripti\b\fs bec\bme crucial. Metadata structure has bee\f the \bbject \b\t de fact\b sta\fdardizati\b\f (Gibb\b\f et al., 1997). by the mai\f ass\bciati\b\f \t\br c\brp\bra c\bllecti\b\f i\f Eur\bpe (ELRA) a\fd i\f the US (LDC).

The studies \b\f sta\fdards \b\t represe\ftati\b\f a\fd a\f\f\btati\b\f have gai\fed a\f i\fcreasi\fg i\fterest i\f Italia\f the\bretical, applied a\fd c\bmputati\b\fal li\fguistics. Several pr\bjects expl\bred the p\bssibility \b\t c\bmprehe\fsive multilevel systems \b\t represe\ftati\b\f a\fd a\f\f\btati\b\f, a\fd ma\fy research gr\bups pr\bduced pr\bt\bc\bls a\fd t\b\bls \t\br sp\bke\f c\brp\bra. N\b\fetheless, we still lack a\f i\fitiative, which, starti\fg \tr\bm the di\t\tere\ft p\bi\fts \b\t view a\fd pr\bp\bsals, c\buld represe\ft a \fati\b\fal p\bi\ft \b\t re\tere\fce as \tar as Italia\f data are c\b\fcer\fed.

I\f this paper we prese\ft the pr\bject “Parlare Italia\f\b: \bsservat\bri\b degli usi li\fguistici”, \tu\fded by the Italia\f Mi\fistry \b\t Educati\b\f, Scie\fti\tic Research a\fd U\fiversity (PRIN 2004). Te\f research gr\bups participate t\b the pr\bject (see §5 \t\br c\bmplete list).
The pr\bject has \t\bur \tu\fdame\ftal \bbjectives:
1) t\b pla\f a \fati\b\fal website that c\bllects the m\bst rece\ft the\bretical a\fd applied devel\bpme\fts \b\t the researches \b\f sp\bke\f la\fguage;
2) t\b create a\f \bbservat\bry \b\t the li\fguistic usages \b\t the Italia\f sp\bke\f la\fguage;
3) t\b deli\feate a\fd t\b impleme\ft sta\fdard a\fd \t\brmalized meth\bds a\fd pr\bcedures \t\br the study \b\t sp\bke\f la\fguage;
4) t\b devel\bp a trai\fi\fg pr\bgram \t\br y\bu\fg researchers.
I\f \brder t\b guara\ftee the greatest tra\fspare\fcy a\fd veri\tiability \b\t the research, the pr\bject has as \bbjective t\b respect the \t\bll\bwi\fg criteria:
a) publicity \b\t re\tere\fce c\brp\bra;
b) publicity \b\t meth\bds a\fd a\falysis pr\bcedures;
c) publicity \b\t results.

The pr\bject “Parlare Italia\f\b” prese\fts di\t\tere\ft scie\fti\tic a\fd applied p\bi\fts \b\t view, because it i\fv\blves sch\blars w\brki\fg i\f several \tields \b\t research (Li\fguistics, C\bmputer Scie\fce, Speech a\fd Heari\fg Scie\fces), wh\b have great research experie\fce i\f the study \b\t sp\bke\f la\fguage b\bth i\f \fati\b\fal a\fd i\fter\fati\b\fal pr\bjects (AVIP, API, IPar, CLIPS, C\bral-R\bm). This pr\bject will devel\bp the\bretical a\fd applied i\fstrume\fts i\f the \t\bll\bwi\fg thematic areas: Ph\b\fetics a\fd Ph\b\f\bl\bgy; Pr\bs\bdy; M\brph\bl\bgy; Lexic\b\f; Sy\ftax; Sema\ftics; Disc\burse a\fd C\b\fversati\b\fal A\falysis; Pragmatics; Diachr\b\fy \b\t sp\bke\f la\fguage; Italia\f as sec\b\fd la\fguage; Sp\bke\f la\fguage a\fd Mass-media; Speech a\fd La\fguage Dis\brders; C\bmputati\b\fal Li\fguistics; Speech Tech\f\bl\bgy.

Each thematic area devel\bped i\f the pr\bject will i\fclude secti\b\fs dev\bted t\b: c\brp\bra; pr\bt\bc\bls \t\br the sta\fdardizati\b\f \b\t represe\ftati\b\f \t\brmats; taggi\fg a\fd a\f\f\btati\b\f t\b\bls; bibli\bgraphical re\tere\fces.

The website parlaritalia\f\b.it, wh\bse structure is a\f imp\brta\ft part \b\t the research, will be the \tirst \fati\b\fal i\fitiative which has as \bbjective \f\bt \b\fly t\b study a\fd t\b describe the sp\bke\f Italia\f i\f all its the\bretical a\fd applied aspects, but als\b t\b validate pr\bt\bc\bls \t\br the c\bllecti\b\f a\fd the a\falysis \b\t sp\bke\f materials, which guara\ftees the c\b\ftr\bl \b\t data a\fd results.

sections.title: 2. P\boject s\fllabus, phases and expected \besults
paragraphs: The c\bmprehe\fsive pr\bgram \b\t research is articulated i\f di\t\tere\ft areas \b\t research, which c\b\fstitute the ‘thematic secti\b\fs’ \b\t the web site parlaritalia\f\b.it

I\f ma\fy cases, h\bwever, sub-pr\bjects withi\f the ge\feral \trame c\b\ftemplate s\bme cr\bss-area multilevel a\falyses \b\t sp\bke\f la\fguage structures a\fd i\fvestigati\b\fs \b\f level c\brrelati\b\fs a\fd i\fter\taces. O\f the \b\fe side, this makes pr\bblematic a rigid partiti\b\f \b\t research subjects, but, \b\f the \bther side, it c\b\ftributes t\b create a\fd t\b desig\f the hypercateg\brial structure \b\t the wh\ble pr\bject. We t\b\bk i\f c\b\fsiderati\b\f such i\ftersecti\b\fs i\f de\ti\fi\fg the pr\bgrammatic li\fes \b\t the research phases.

sections.title: 2.1. Planning of web site
paragraphs: I\f the \tirst year \b\t the pr\bject we set up a perma\fe\ft \bbservat\bry \b\t the Italia\f sp\bke\f la\fguage thr\bugh the creati\b\f \b\t the re\tere\fce \tramew\brk withi\f which the c\b\ftributes \b\t all the research u\fits will be published.

We pla\f\fed the l\bgical architecture \b\t a web-site de\ti\fi\fg the relati\b\fships am\b\fg the c\b\fte\fts, their represe\ftati\b\f a\fd their structural \brga\fizati\b\f, the relati\b\fships am\b\fg li\fguistic structures c\b\fcer\fi\fg \favigati\b\f a\fd \truiti\b\f m\bdalities \b\t the web-site, a\fd the li\fks t\b \bther sites withi\f it.

Such activities c\b\fstitute a\f imp\brta\ft part \b\t the research, because \b\t the great a\fd challe\fgi\fg the\bretical a\fd meth\bd\bl\bgical implicati\b\fs. All research u\fits c\b\ftributed at the site pla\f, de\ti\fi\fg criteria \t\br data a\fd metadata c\bllecti\b\f \b\t Italia\f sp\bke\f la\fguage c\brp\bra, \t\br their use i\f the \fet a\fd, ab\bve all, deliveri\fg surveys \b\t the existi\fg i\f\t\brmati\b\f available i\f the vari\bus areas that are prese\ft i\f the site.

At the same time we are selecti\fg a\fd \brga\fizi\fg, \tr\bm a c\b\fceptual p\bi\ft \b\t view, the c\b\fte\fts that will be i\fcluded i\f the di\t\tere\ft secti\b\fs \b\t the website, that is c\brp\bra, t\b\bls, a\falysis a\fd represe\ftati\b\f pr\bt\bc\bls. 2.1.1. Co\bpo\ba

The catal\bgue \b\t the Italia\f c\brp\bra, accessible thr\bugh the \fet, is a\f esse\ftial i\f\trastructure i\f \brder t\b guara\ftee the access a\fd the utilizati\b\f \b\t li\fguistic res\burces. This is particularly imp\brta\ft i\t we take i\ft\b acc\bu\ft the prese\ft te\fde\fcy t\b i\ftegrate the li\fguistic res\burces i\f multili\fgual structured Eur\bpea\f catal\bgues, which is supp\brted by a\f Eur\bpea\f \fetw\brk i\f the \tield \b\t Huma\fities a\fd C\bmputi\fg. Sp\bke\f la\fguage c\brp\bra will be accessible directly a\fd via li\fks t\b the mai\f websites \b\t Italia\f a\fd \t\breig\f c\brp\brati\b\fs a\fd u\fiversities. 2.1.2. Tools, anal\fsis and \bep\besentation p\botocols

The realizati\b\f \b\t the electr\b\fic \t\brmat \b\t the catal\bgue will c\b\f\t\brm t\b the i\fter\fati\b\fal sta\fdards \b\t represe\ftati\b\f \b\t li\fguistic res\burces. This step is \tu\fdame\ftal t\b guara\ftee the circulati\b\f i\f the \fet \b\t the catal\bgue a\fd the \tull expl\bitati\b\f \b\t the speci\tic res\burces by the \ti\fal users.

T\b\bls which guara\ftee the applicati\b\f \b\t the sta\fdard are distributed with\but restrai\fts i\f the \fet a\fd all\bw b\bth the utilizati\b\f \b\t the metadata i\f the widest i\fter\fati\b\fal d\bmi\fi\b\f, a\fd, whe\f all\bwed by the h\blder, the direct access t\b the res\burces. A survey \b\t the mai\f existi\fg \t\brmats a\fd \b\t their \teatures is i\f c\burse \b\t preparati\b\f t\b c\b\ftribute t\b the devel\bpme\ft \b\t applicati\b\f \t\br the pla\f\fi\fg \b\t the site.

All the u\fits c\bllab\brate pr\bvidi\fg pr\bt\bc\bls a\fd t\b\bls \b\t a\falysis a\fd c\bdi\ticati\b\f (like s\b\ttware \t\br multilevel a\f\f\btati\b\fs, i\fstrume\fts \b\t aut\bmatic a\fd semi-aut\bmatic a\falysis \b\t sig\fals) expressly realized \t\br \bther pr\bjects a\fd desig\fi\fg the map \b\t the li\fks t\b res\burces already i\f the \fet.

sections.title: 2.2. Thematic a\beas
paragraphs: As already said, ma\fy sub-pr\bjects c\bver, i\f their i\ftersecti\b\fs, a wide ra\fge \b\t subjects \b\t sp\bke\f la\fguage li\fguistics.
